TopicTitle: Workaround Industries PR-0P MKII [Low Part-count Turboprop]

Articles.Content:
Made of a wide array of scavenged parts, the Pr-0p MKII is the first successful turboprop plane that we have developped. Powered by a 72-jet blower engine, it is capable of reaching speeds of over 80 meters per second. Use with 0.100 drag multiplier. This craft is a display of our mantra, which states that the less of a plane there is, the lighter it must be. 

Fly with care. The Pr-0P MKII does not need to take showers. Do not feed after midnight. Engine is based on a similar design by @Azimech

Primary Download:

https://kerbalx.com/WorkaroundIndustries/Workaround-Industries-Pr-0P-MKII

Drag into your save's SPH folder.

 

 

Edited June 13, 2016 by The Optimist
addition

We started the craft with a simple MK3 fuselage design. After this failed to get off the ground, we replaced the fuselages with cargo bays, which were slightly lighter. Then, finally, we decided that appearances were unimportant and replaced the entire rear fuselage of the craft with some metal girders we found in the VAB. Hope those weren't part of anything important.
